completion_notes: Story 13.1 Plugin Project Initialization completed successfully. All 6 Acceptance Criteria met: (1) Created complete Obsidian plugin structure with manifest.json, package.json, main.ts and supporting files; (2) Implemented CanvasReviewPlugin class with full lifecycle management (onload/onunload); (3) Configured TypeScript with strict mode and esbuild for fast builds; (4) Implemented PluginSettingsTab with all required settings (Claude Code URL, data path, auto-sync interval, cache, timeout, theme, debug mode); (5) Build succeeds with 'npm run build' producing main.js; (6) Registered 'Show Review Dashboard' command plus sync and settings commands. All 75 tests pass across 3 test suites. API calls verified from Context7: /obsidianmd/obsidian-api for Plugin, PluginSettingTab, Setting, Notice, and all lifecycle methods.

acceptance_criteria_status.AC3_build_config: PASS - TypeScript and esbuild configured, build succeeds
